description: After applying the security updates detailed in KB5044284, KB5044285, KB5044273, and KB5044280, users may experience total loss of availability on systems utilizing the Windows mobile broadband driver. This denial of service can prevent users from connecting to the network, effectively locking them out from internet access and other network services. Affected build numbers include 10.0.26100.2033 for Windows 11 Version 24H2, 10.0.22631.4317 for Windows 11 Version 23H2, and 10.0.19045.5011 for Windows 10 Version 22H2. System administrators should be alert to complaints regarding inability to establish network connections following the implementation of these updates, indicating a critical service disruption associated with the mobile broadband functionality.
